text: Eugene Robert "Gene" Kotlarek (March 31, 1940 - November 9, 2017) was an American former ski jumper. He competed at the 1960 and 1964 Winter Olympics with the best result of 14th place in the normal hill in 1964. He was born in Duluth, Minnesota. Kotlarek died on November 9, 2017 in Colorado Springs, Colorado at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Olympians for the United States Category:American skiers Category:Sportspeople from Minnesota
title: Gene Kotlarek
